official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1974.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966, appropriations for fiscal year 1974. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 1409)

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1974.
